main event: A round, white object was sighted moving at high speed from north to south over Hollywood, California on August 7, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 seconds, traveling in an arc and then disappearing.
The object was described as 5 feet in diameter and moving as fast as a jet aircraft.
A small aircraft was also spotted in the same general area around the time of the sighting.
The observer suggested the object could have been a searchlight, such as those used for grand openings of businesses.
The sighting was reported and documented through the official Project 10073 record card process.
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
